籤詩版本二:
Ubuncwane obuxabisekileyo kunye nobutyebi bufihlwe ngaphakathi.
Kungcono ukulinda ubulumko bomntu osisilumko kwaye ukhululeke ngakumbi.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifihla umfanekiso ofunyenwe kwi-jade.
Yonke into inokwenziwa ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
解曰: Iqulethe igolide kunye nejeyidi. Andazi ukuba ujonge ntoni. Dibana nesikhokelo sakho. Akukho mfuneko yakukhathazeka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lima igolide kwaye uqeshe ububele
UCheng Yaojin wayenguyise umseki woBukhosi bamaTang.Ngenye imini uRengui wayesaphumla ezintabeni.Ngesiquphe wafumana uYaojin eleqwa yingwe njengoko wayedlula.URengui wamfumana,wenzakalisa ingwe,waze wasindisa uYaojin. .
UYaojin wayeyithanda kakhulu ikarati kaRengui, wamnika utolo lweJinling, waza wamcela ukuba aye emkhosini.
UXue Rengui kamva waba ngumphathi weTang Dynasty.
聖意: Thandazela ikhaya lakho kunye nokhuseleko lwakho, uthandazela ubutyebi bakho, kwaye ulinde umtshato wakho uhlehliswe. , abasebenzi, nezimangalo zikawonke-wonke.Ukufuduka zizinto ezintle nezilahlekileyo.Izifo zasemantla zifunyanwa ngoogqirha abalungileyo.Amangcwaba asentabeni kufuneka atshintshwe.
